What to say when leaving the home.ARABIC_TEXT: (بِسْمِ اللَّهِ، تَوَكَّلْتُ عَلَى اللَّهِ، وَلَاَ حَوْلَ وَلَا قُوَّةَ إِلاَّ بِاللَّهِ).
What to say when leaving the home.LANGUAGE_ARABIC_TRANSLATED_TEXT: (Bismil-lah, tawakkaltu AAalal-lah, wala hawla wala quwwata illa billah.)
What to say when leaving the home.TRANSLATED_TEXT: (In the name of Allah, I place my trust in Allah, and there is no might nor power except with Allah.)

What to say when leaving the home.ARABIC_TEXT: (اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَعُوذُ بِكَ أَنْ أَضِلَّ، أَوْ أُضَلَّ، أَوْ أَزِلَّ، أَوْ أُزَلَّ، أَوْ أَظْلِمَ، أَوْ أُظْلَمَ، أَوْ أَجْهَلَ، أَوْ يُجْهَلَ عَلَيَّ).
What to say when leaving the home.LANGUAGE_ARABIC_TRANSLATED_TEXT: (Allahumma innee aAAoothu bika an adilla aw odal, aw azilla aw ozall, aw athlima aw othlam, aw ajhala aw yujhala AAalay.)
What to say when leaving the home.TRANSLATED_TEXT: (O Allah, I take refuge with You lest I should stray or be led astray, or slip or be tripped, or oppress or be oppressed, or behave foolishly or be treated foolishly.)(slip: i.e. to commit a sin unintentionally)
